Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)
install.packages("tidyverse")
library(tidyverse)
data("iris")
library(RColorBrewer)

iris_1 <- aggregate(iris[, 1:4], list(iris$Species), mean)
iris_1 <- gather(iris_1, name, values, -Group.1)
iris_2 <- aggregate(iris[, 1:4], list(iris$Species), sd)
iris_2 <- gather(iris_2, SD, values, -Group.1)

names(iris_1)[names(iris_1) == "values"] <- "Mean"
names(iris_1)[names(iris_1) == "Group.1"] <- "Species"

iris_1$sd <- iris_2$values

iris_mean_sd <- ggplot(iris_1, aes(x = Species, y= Mean, fill=name)) +
geom_bar(position = position_dodge(), stat="identity") +
geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=Mean-sd, ymax=Mean+sd),
width=.2, position=position_dodge(.9)) + scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Spectral")
iris_mean_sd

```
